name: HackInsan
contribution: Secured 1st Place in the Pemuda GEMA Category.
Achieved 3rd Place Overall in the HackInsan 2024 competition.

Focused on cultural insights and personalized teaching methods.

name: GCPBoleh Cloud Challenge (Season 5)
contribution: Earned 10+ Google Cloud skill badges via Cloud Skills Boost, mastering GCP infrastructure, Terraform, Vertex AI, and secure network design through intensive hands-on labs.
Built automated cloud solutions using Compute Engine and Cloud Storage.
Deployed scalable serverless apps using Firebase including authentication, database, and hosting features.
Analyzed NCAA® March Madness® data with BigQuery and applied TensorFlow for machine learning insights in a competitive challenge.
Certified in GCP fundamentals, data/ML workflows, and infrastructure-as-code (IaC) through a structured self-study program.

name: H2O Splashmania
